current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Indian Child Protection and Family Violence Prevention Act to require background
			 checks before foster care placements are ordered in tribal court
			 proceedings, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Native American Children's Safety Act
